text: Falao shuo:`Zai wo yunxu nimen zhiqian, nimen jiu xinfeng tamenle ma? Ta biding shi nimen de touzi, ta ba moshu chuanshou nimen, suoyi wo shi bi jiaohuzhe kan diao nimen de shou he jiao, wo shi bi ba nimen ding si zai ye zao shugan shang, nimen biding zhidao women lia shui de xingfa geng yanli, geng changjiu.'
